Name: Encanto
Director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
Star: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo, Mauro Castillo
Summary: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Name: Arcane
Star: Hailee Steinfeld, Kevin Alejandro, Jason Spisak, Harry Lloyd
Summary: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

Name: Sing 2
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson, Tori Kelly
Summary: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

Name: The Grinch
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones, Pharrell Williams
Summary: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Name: The Polar Express
Star: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis
Summary: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Ron's Gone Wrong
Director: Sarah Smith, Jean-Philippe Vine, Octavio E. Rodriguez
Star: Jack Dylan Grazer, Zach Galifianakis, Ed Helms, Olivia Colman
Summary: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

Name: Klaus
Star: Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
Summary: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Sing
Star: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson
Summary: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

Name: Rumble
Star: Geraldine Viswanathan, Will Arnett, Stephen A. Smith, Terry Crews
Summary: In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.

Name: Back to the Outback
Star: Guy Pearce, Jacki Weaver, Isla Fisher, Eric Bana
Summary: Tired of being locked in a reptile house where humans gawk at them like they're monsters, a group of Australia's deadliest creatures plot a daring escape from their zoo to the Outback.

Name: A Christmas Carol
Star: Jim Carrey, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Steve Valentine
Summary: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Name: What If...?
Star: Jeffrey Wright, Terri Douglas, Matthew Wood, Robin Atkin Downes
Summary: Exploring pivotal moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and turning them on their head, leading the audience into uncharted territory.

Name: Attack on Titan
Star: Yûki Kaji, Marina Inoue, Josh Grelle, Yui Ishikawa
Summary: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Star: Natsuki Hanae, Zach Aguilar, Hiro Shimono, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
Summary: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Name: South Park
Star: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes, Mona Marshall
Summary: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

Name: The Simpsons
Star: Dan Castellaneta, Nancy Cartwright, Harry Shearer, Julie Kavner
Summary: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

Name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
Star: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
Summary: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

Name: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
Star: Theo James, Mary McDonnell, Lara Pulver, Graham McTavish
Summary: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

Name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
Star: Billie Mae Richards, Burl Ives, Larry D. Mann, Paul Soles
Summary: Young reindeer Rudolph lives at the North Pole. His father is one of Santa's reindeer and it is expected that Rudolph will eventually be one too. However, he has a feature which is a setback and causes him to be ostracized: his red nose.

Name: Family Guy
Star: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis
Summary: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.

Name: Archer
Star: H. Jon Benjamin, Judy Greer, Amber Nash, Chris Parnell
Summary: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

Name: Rick and Morty
Star: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Summary: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

Name: Bob's Burgers
Star: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Summary: Bob Belcher runs his dream restaurant with his wife and three children as their last hope of holding the family together.

Name: One Piece
Star: Mayumi Tanaka, Tony Beck, Laurent Vernin, Akemi Okamura
Summary: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
Star: Boris Karloff, Thurl Ravenscroft, June Foray, Dal McKennon
Summary: A grumpy hermit hatches a plan to steal Christmas from the Whos of Whoville.

Name: Arthur Christmas
Star: James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent, Bill Nighy, Hugh Laurie
Summary: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

Name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse - Part One
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
Star: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac, Issa Rae
Summary: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Oscar®-winning Spider-Verse saga, an epic adventure that will transport Brooklyn's full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man across the ...                See full summary »

Name: Frozen
Star: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad
Summary: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

Name: Santa Inc.
Star: Sarah Silverman, Seth Rogen, Maria Bamford, Joel Kim Booster
Summary: An elf working in Santa's Workshop in the North Pole dreams of becoming Santa Claus someday.

Name: The Star
Star: Steven Yeun, Keegan-Michael Key, Aidy Bryant, Gina Rodriguez
Summary: A small but brave donkey and his animal friends become the unsung heroes of the first Christmas.

Name: A Charlie Brown Christmas
Star: Ann Altieri, Chris Doran, Sally Dryer, Bill Melendez
Summary: Depressed at the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find a deeper meaning to Christmas.

Name: Big Mouth
Star: Nick Kroll, John Mulaney, Jessi Klein, Jason Mantzoukas
Summary: Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.

Name: Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town
Star: Fred Astaire, Mickey Rooney, Keenan Wynn, Paul Frees
Summary: A mailman reveals the origin of Santa Claus.

Name: The Bad Guys
Star: Sam Rockwell, Awkwafina, Anthony Ramos, Marc Maron
Summary: Mr. Wolf, Mr. Snake, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Ms. Tarantula hatch a plot to pull off the ultimate heist.

Name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Star: Matthew Mercer, David Vincent, Daisuke Ono, Unshô Ishizuka
Summary: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

Name: South Park: Post COVID
Star: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart, Mona Marshall
Summary: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived but will never be the same Post Covid.

Name: BoJack Horseman
Star: Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, Alison Brie, Aaron Paul
Summary: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

Name: Rise of the Guardians
Star: Hugh Jackman, Alec Baldwin, Isla Fisher, Chris Pine
Summary: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

Name: Moana
Director: Ron Clements, John Musker, Don Hall, Chris Williams
Star: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House, Temuera Morrison
Summary: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

Name: Invincible
Star: Steven Yeun, J.K. Simmons, Sandra Oh, Zazie Beetz
Summary: An adult animated series based on the Skybound/Image comic about a teenager whose father is the most powerful superhero on the planet.

Name: Raya and the Last Dragon
Director: Don Hall, Carlos López Estrada, Paul Briggs, John Ripa
Star: Kelly Marie Tran, Awkwafina, Gemma Chan, Izaac Wang
Summary: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

Name: Luca
Star: Jacob Tremblay, Jack Dylan Grazer, Emma Berman, Saverio Raimondo
Summary: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

Name: Young Justice
Star: Nolan North, Danica McKellar, Stephanie Lemelin, Jesse McCartney
Summary: Teenage superheroes strive to prove themselves as members of the Justice League.

Name: Cowboy Bebop
Star: Kôichi Yamadera, Unshô Ishizuka, Megumi Hayashibara, Steve Blum
Summary: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

Name: South Park: Post Covid - The Return of Covid
Star: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart, Kimberly Brooks
Summary: If Stan, Kyle and Cartman could just work together, they could go back in time to make sure Covid never happened and save Kenny's life. Traveling back to the past seems to be the easy answer until they meet Victor Chaos.

Name: My Hero Academia
Star: Daiki Yamashita, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ayane Sakura, Justin Briner
Summary: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

Name: The Year Without a Santa Claus
Star: Shirley Booth, Mickey Rooney, Dick Shawn, George S. Irving
Summary: When a weary and discouraged Santa Claus considers skipping his Christmas Eve run one year, Mrs. Claus and his elves set out to change his mind.

Name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
Star: Dee Bradley Baker, Zach Tyler Eisen, Mae Whitman, Jack De Sena
Summary: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

Name: The Mitchells vs the Machines
Star: Abbi Jacobson, Danny McBride, Maya Rudolph, Michael Rianda
Summary: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.
